    Check out our latest Azure IaaS Memory-optimized NVMe-enabled VM sizes in the Ebsv5 series now AVAILABLE for Preview. These new VM sizes offer up to 260K IOPS and 8 GB/s throughput and are ideal for running your data-intense workloads such as SQL Server, Oracle, and other analytics applications.
